attributes.action: Banish the Deadly serious to Mars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A sense of humour is an essential to lead  a fulfilled life; it improves IQ, leads to better health and enhances one's appeal. 

However, all to often we Come across those who do not seem to have one at all.  They are deadly serious, can not make light of anything and make life a misery for the rest of us.  They cannot be allowed to inflict their warped values for any longer.

If this problem can not be solved medically there is only one solution; banish them to Mars.   I believe there may be space there.

This issue requires the government's immediate attention as it is the pressing issue of our times and failure to act could lead to civil unrest and economic collapse.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
